items.title: ATAD Tableau Desktop Certified Associate Practice Exams

visible_instructors.title: Venkatesh Chandra
visible_instructors.name: Venkatesh
visible_instructors.job_title: Certified Tableau Desktop Associate | Data Scientist

items.headline: 5 Tests | 175 Questions + Detailed Explanations + 6 Datasets | Keep Practicing and Become Test Ready
objectives_summary: You will be tested on the topics covering areas like Data Connections, Organizing & Simplifying data, Calculations, Field & Chart Types, Mapping, Analytics, and Dashboards
Calculations: String and Date calculations, Quick Table calculations, Level of Detail (LOD) expressions, Aggregation options, Calculations in join clauses
Field & Chart Types: Measures and Dimensions, Discrete and Continuous fields, Tableau-generated fields, Histograms, Heat maps, Tree-maps, and Bullet graphs
